name: Conquering the Academy with Just a Sashimi Knife.
author: GMAN
content: &quotIf I slash, it will be cut.&quotI, who was once called the best swordsman in the nation, have ended up in a mobile game I&#039ve only spent money on a few times. And I’ve even received the blessing of the &#039Sword God&#039!But… the only weapon I can use is a sashimi knife?Just one minute a day. I become a Sword Saint with a sashimi knife.
